title: Image Declaration

definitions.image proxy: a unique identifier for MLLMs to index and distinguish between visual and text embeddings
definitions.natural language prompts: used to establish references between text and image
definitions.text-to-image reference: assists the model in correlating the text with the appropriate image

summary: The slide discusses the process of image declaration in the context of MLLMs, highlighting the allocation of a unique image proxy, the use of natural language prompts to establish text-image references, and the incorporation of these references in the image declaration to aid in correlating text with the appropriate image.
